channel.title: Admin Only on VitaminDWiki
channel.description: Recent content in Admin Only on VitaminDWiki

item.title: 10 minutes
item.description:
5-10 minutes of sun provides ONLY 1,000 IU ONLY IF

  • you are near the equator

  • AND young (seniors 4X longer)

  •   AND not obese ( need 3X longer)

  •    AND have light skin (Dark Skin need 4X longer)

  •     AND it is summer

  •      AND it is the middle of the day

  •       AND you have lots of skin exposed to the sun

  •        AND you are lying down

  •         AND you are not wearing sunscreen

item.title: After reaching Vitamin D plateau we need to evaluate response
item.description:
Expecting to give 50,000 IU of Vitamin D weekly (or 7,000 IU) daily to many adults,

   along with some Magnesium and Vitamin K2-7

After the response has plateaued (1 month with loading dose, 3 months otherwise)

everyone should get a vitamin D test to determin if any change is needed

|| Test results|%|Possible reasons for the result|Possible actions

<40 ng%%% (<100 nmol/L)|32%|Senior, Autistic, Smoker, Obese, slow responder%%%taking statins, low magnesium, bariatric surgery, %%%Poor health (consuming vitamin D)%%%POOR: liver, genes, gut, pancreas, gall bladder|1) larger dose of Vitamin D, %%%2) gut-friendly vitamin D, %%%3) probiotics%%%4) wait for slow responder

item.title: 50K vitamin D levels and diseases
item.description:
||Response to Vitamin D |Additional Diseases Treated

|A%%%B %%%C

| ||

VitaminDWiki interview and transcript - Jan 2022

40-150 ng of Vitamin D need to treat health problems

Hypothesis of cause and effect of vitamin D deficiency

48 Health problems fought by weekly 50K Vitamin D

item.title: Health Problems list in VitaminDWiki
item.description: ADHD and Vitamin D Deficiency|ADHD (42+);    Overview Alcohol and Vitamin D|Alcohol (29+);    Allergy - Overview|Allergy (24+);    [tiki-index.php?page_id=1409] (30+);    Overview Alzheimer’s-Cognition and Vitamin D|Alzheimer’s (81+) Ankylosing spondylitis and low vitamin D – several studies|Ankylosing Spondylitis (20+);    Antibiotics, probiotics|Antibiotics/Probiotics (81+);    Overview Asthma and Vitamin D|Asthma (129+ );    Atopic Dermatitis and Eczema - many studies|Atopic Dermatitis (18+) ;    Autism (146+);    Autoimmune (188+);    Back Pain (40+) ;    Bipolar Disorder may be related to cellular, not blood Vitamin D|Bipolar Disorder (15+) ;    Bone - Health (296+) ;    Breathing (428+); [tiki-index.php?page_id=143316] (132+) ; [tiki-index.php?page_id=1324] (50+) ;    [tiki-index.php?page_id=6048] (30+);    Cancer (256+);    *Cancer - After diagnosis|After diagnosis (97+)  Cancer - Bladder|Bladder (25+)  [tiki-index.php?page_id=7048] (8+)  Cancer - Breast|Breast (241+):    Cancer - Colon|Colon (134+);    Gastric Cancer, Vitamin D, VDR, UV - many studies|Gastric (9+)  Cancer - Leukemia|Leukemia (18+)  Cancer - Liver|Liver (16+)  Cancer - Lung|Lung (53+) Overview Lung cancer and vitamin D|Overview;    *Cancer - Lymphoma|Lymphoma (23+)  [tiki-index.php?page_id=13263] (43+)  [tiki-index.php?page_id=395] (17+)  Cancer - Other|Other (59+)  Cancer - Ovarian|Ovarian (23+)   Cancer - Pancreatic|Pancreatic (54+)   Cancer - Prostate|Prostate (97+) Overview Prostate Cancer and Vitamin D|Overview;    Cancer - Skin|Skin (116+);    [tiki-index.php?page_id=9344] (7+)
